Name: Dreamsicle
Ingredients: 45 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. FLOAT cream.
Review: Sweet coffee and orange smoothed by a creamy top. A veritable dessert in a glass. (Better when made with a dry coffee liqueur.)
Nutrition: One serving of Dreamsicle contains 225 calories
